title: Nuclear Reactor Phys I
description: Intermediate treatment of reactor physics and associated advanced mathematics topics.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: (MATH 2403 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2413 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 24X3 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T or MATH 2552 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2562 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2X52 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T) and (NRE 3301 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or NRE 2120 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D) and CS 1371 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
